hooks.command:
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.py$ ]]; then
  ruff check --fix --quiet "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>&1
  ruff format --quiet "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>&1
  if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo '{"feedback": "ruff formatting failed â€” check for syntax errors."}' >&2
    exit 1
  else
    echo '{"feedback": "ruff: formatted.", "suppressOutput": true}'
  fi
fi
